Na Instagram View this profile on Instagram Reviews My company hosted a team happy hour here with the help of their Events Manager Cherish. It was a great experience from beginning to end!I have not been here in a few years and was very impressed with the upgrades made. The drinks and food were great and my team enjoyed the experience and attention to details.If you are in a need of a space for a company event, Cherish will make sure it is a flawless experience. - Janelle S. (MIA) This is a great event venue! Cherish, the events manager, was amazing. She helped plan and host my business launch party. Planning the event was so easy and fun and the event went better than I couldâ€™ve hoped. Highly recommend booking your events here! - Salma M. (MIA) My friends and I visited Blue Martini two weekends ago during my bachelorette weekend. The staff were so friendly and accommodating, we ended up staying the whole night. The environment and music were great too! Will definitely be coming back here anytime Iâ€™m in Miami. Thank you for the amazing hospitality - A soon to be bride and her Texas girls - Maria V. (MIA) We randomly stumbled in here and had a great time. We had a party of 15 and were able to get drinks immediately. We didnâ€™t think we would stay so we didnâ€™t do bottle service, then we ended up staying 3 hours and did it anyway.  The DJ was killing it! He played every genre and a little something for everyone. - Angeli P. (MIA) Blue Martini Brickell was recently remodeled and just reopened not too long ago. This classy venue is on track to become a top night life destination in Miami with it's impressive world-class sound system and service for the elite and chic crowd. - 305 Luigi (MIA) Previous Next Questions? ABOUT US â€“ Blue Martini Group Skip to content info@bluemartinigroup.com +353 152-42101Ã¢Â€Â‹ HOME ABOUT US OUR PEOPLE OUR SERVICES EVENT MANAGEMENT DIGITAL MARKETING VENDOR MANAGEMENT DIGITAL AGENCY ICE RINKS ICE MANAGEMENT ICE SUPPLY TERMS OF USE SUSTAINABLE ECONOMICAL SHOPPING CENTER ACCESSORIES LEISURE BOX CONTACT HOME ABOUT US OUR PEOPLE OUR SERVICES EVENT MANAGEMENT DIGITAL MARKETING VENDOR MANAGEMENT DIGITAL AGENCY ICE RINKS ICE MANAGEMENT ICE SUPPLY TERMS OF USE SUSTAINABLE ECONOMICAL SHOPPING CENTER ACCESSORIES LEISURE BOX CONTACT ABOUT US Blue Martini Group are specialists in designing, installing and managing Ice Rinks and other events. At BMG, we care passionately about our events and pride ourselves on a high level of customer services from when we first receive your enquiry to the design, delivery, and build of our rink right through to the end of each event.Ã‚Â Ã‚ Management of each event is specific as we build each event accordingly to venue and pricing. BMG is dedicated to providing consistently strong events in areas with high levels of football such as Dundrum Town Center in Dublin, Spinningfields in Manchester and Bournemouth Lower Gardens. In order to bring about a smooth and seamless approach to our venues we are partnered with established and experienced companies such as Ice-World International, Aggreko plc, and DeBoer who bring with them a proven track record and who value our passion, dedication and commitment to service. OUR CLIENTS Our client base is diverse, and includes organisations such as City & County Councils, Shopping & Town Centres, Hotel & Retail Parks, Mid-Large Corporates, etc. OUR PARTNERS We are proud to say our supplier base includes the worldÃ¢Â€Â™s most pre-eminent suppliers within our sector areas. A selection of our partners and suppliers are shown below: Blue Martini Group assume diverse positions in leisure venture opportunities where we act as principals, operators, distributors or consultants. We partner with landlords or stakeholders of premium locations in Ireland & the UK where these assets can be commercialised through the medium of events. Blue Martini Group | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Articles People Learning Jobs Games Join now Sign in Blue Martini Group Events Services Excellence in Event Management Follow Discover all 26 employees Report this company About us About us
B.M.G is the largest seasonal ice rink and pop up events Company in Ireland. We have delivered market leading events to the Irish market for many years and we have expanded our operations into the UK. We have partnered with well established and experienced companies who bring with them a proven track record, and have worked with us over the previous years and who value our passion, dedication and commitment to delivering the best possible events for our clients.

Seasonal Ice Rinks are a very well established business in the UK and on the continent but the concept is a relatively new one in Ireland. Seasonal rinks tend to operate for between 8 and 12 weeks each season. The most successful rinks operate in areas of high footfall such as shopping centres, town centres and tourist attractions. Many shopping centre operators use ice rinks as a seasonal attraction and part of the Christmas activity or point of difference. We have positioned ourselves as a one-stop solutions company for this market. Website http://www.bluemartinigroup.com External link for Blue Martini Group Industry Events Services Company size 51-200 employees Headquarters Dublin 24 Type Privately Held Founded 2011 Specialties Ice Rinks, Seasonal Events, Pop-Up Events, Event Solutions, Event Management, Ice Skating, Winter Events, Christmas Events, and Pop-Up Ice Rinks Locations Primary 3300 Lakedrive Citywest Business Campus Dublin 24, IE Get directions 3300 Lake Drive, Citywest Business Campus Dublin 24,, IE Get directions Employees at Blue Martini Group Annie Arshak jocelyn custodio Entertainment Professional Aleny M. Stay tuned for more updates as we roll out future phases. #LeisureBox #BlueMartiniGroup #ONICE #SwordsPavilions #IndoorLeisure #FamilyFun #Openingsoon â€¦more 36 2 Comments Like Comment Share Blue Martini Group 621 followers 6mo Report this post Itâ€™s been a whirlwind season at BMG, the home of ONICE in Ireland and the UK.
